content.rendered:
airBaltic airline was established as Air Baltic on  1995. It is legally incorporated as AS Air Baltic Corporation, is a state-owned Latvian low-cost carrier and the country’s flag carrier, with its head office on the grounds of Riga International Airport in Mārupe municipality near Riga. Its main hub is at Riga International Airport with further bases at Tallinn Airport and Vilnius Airport.

View airBaltic Hand / Cabin | Checked Baggage Allowance and Excess Baggage rates in the below link

airBaltic Checked Baggage

airBaltic Excess Baggage

airBaltic Hand | Cabin Baggage

airBaltic Offices Worldwide

Find airBaltic Reservation | Town | Sales | Airport Offices Contact details such as Address, Phone number, Location, Email and more details in your country
